info.name: HCTP: Gnome-like caption area (FX 56-)
info.description: Removes the minimize and maximize buttons for Hide Caption Toolbar Plus, centers close button on maximized windows.
info.additionalInfo: Does not style the close button itself, so I recommend using the Windows 10 caption buttons for closest style. It seems like something HCTP does seems to break it, as a temporary fix just disable and enable the style.
